1.「……我らは 紅衣の悪夢団。: We are the Redcoat Nightmare Squad.

2.「刻印を 刻まれし者よ。| 汝の命……我らの供物として 捧げよう。: O Marked One. Thy life we offer as an offering|to us.

4.しかし 突然のめまいに おそわれ|意識が 遠のいていく……。: But then a sudden dizziness takes over and|consciousness fades away...

5.<cs_pchero>は 気を取り直すと|夢占い師の水晶玉を 清めた。: <cs_pchero> regained their composure and|cleaned the Dreamer's Crystal Ball.

6.「……水晶玉よ 我が問いに答えたまえ。 | あまたに分かれし 運命の糸をたぐりて: O crystal ball, answer my question. Tap into|the many threads of destiny, and show me the|path I must take!

7.「お前さん 夢の中で刻まれた刻印が| 現実の世界でも 胸に 刻まれたのじゃな？: You, you have the same imprint on your chest|in the real world that was carved in your|dream, haven't you?

8.「すでに 予感しているかもしれんが| その刻印が 完成する時| そこに 待ってお: You may already have an inkling of what awaits|you when the mark is complete...

10.「……その刻印は 夢に現れた存在が | お前さんの 強い生命力に目をつけ| エモ:
That mark is the mark of a being that appeared|to you in a dream, and that being saw your|strong life force and wanted to take you as|
|its prey.

11.「そやつは 多くの人々に 同じ悪夢を見せ| エモノを物色しているようじゃの。|: It seems that he is looking for something that|will give many people the same nightmare. You|have been chosen to be the sacrificial lamb.

12.「で お前さんに刻印を刻んだ存在だが……| ひょっとすると 名前くらいは| 聞い: So, the entity that put his imprint on you...|maybe you've heard of him, at least by name.

13.「その名は…… ダークドレアム。 | 夢の世界に君臨する 破壊と殺りくの神じゃ。: His name is Nokturnus. He is the god of|destruction and murder who reigns in the world|of dreams.

14.「やつは エモノとなった者の生命力を奪うことで| チカラを増幅させ 夢の世界から:
He is planning to invade this world from the|world of dreams by amplifying his power by|taking the life force of those who have become|
|monsters.

15.「放っておけば 他にも 刻印の犠牲者は出よう。| 何より ドレアムが この世界に:
If left unchecked, there will be other victims|of the Mark. Above all, there is no telling|how much destruction Dreem's appearance in|
|this world will bring.

16.「どうやら 紅衣の悪夢団とやらは やつを崇め | その手先となっている 集団のよ:
It seems that the Redcoat Nightmare Gang is a|group of people who worship him and work for|him. They've caught the attention of some very|
|scary people.

17.「ふぉっ ほっ ほっ。なに 心配するでない。 | わしが協力すれば 刻印の進行を: Ho, ho, ho. Don't worry. With my help, it will|not be impossible to stop the progress of the|Mark and thwart the plot.

18.「だが…… 今すぐには 無理じゃ。| 夢占いは お前さんが思ってるより ずっと|: But... it's not possible right now. Dream|reading takes a lot more power than you think.|Let's take a break for a while.

19.「お前さんにも やるべきことがあるようだね？| それが終わったら また ここへ戻: Looks like you have some work to do, too, huh?|When you're done, come back here again. I'll|tell you how to get rid of the mark.

20.「……ふむ。どうやら 事態は| わしが 思っていたよりも 深刻なようじゃね。: Hmmm... It seems the situation is more serious|than I thought.

21.「……我が供物よ。 | 運命に抗うことは できぬと知れ。: My offerings. Know that you cannot resist your|destiny.

22.「……すべては 我らが 主のために。: ...all for the sake of our Lord.
